Title: Relates to the issue of non-commercial drivers' licenses and learners' permits in counties which contain in whole or in part boundary land; repealer
Summary: Relates to the issue of non-commercial drivers' licenses and learners' permits in counties which contain in whole or in part boundary land.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the issue of non-commercial drivers' licenses and learners' permits in counties which contain in whole or in part boundary land; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
